outline:
1. alone, by itself, besides, a part, separation, being alone
    1. separation, alone, by itself
      1. only (adv)
      2. apart from, besides (prep)
    2. part
    3. parts (eg limbs, shoots), bars
kjv_def: alone, apart, bar, besides, branch, by self, of each alike, except, only, part, staff, strength.
strongs_def: properly, separation; by implication, a part of the body, branch of atree, bar forcarrying; figuratively, chief of a city; especially (with prepositional prefix) as an adverb, apart, only, besides
